Articles.Content:
Since the orbiter forum refuses to let me register, I\'ll ask it here.

I attached payload onto a space shuttle, but it\'s placed in the wrong position, colliding with the payload doors, how do I place it in the correct place?

Thanks.

Ask the Orbiter Forums... JK

Try moving the ship, instead of the payload.

Well there was a trick to do that. That\'s...hmmm....

Well, back when I played Orbiter, the config file for the Space Shuttle should have a place to be edited WITH the payload.

So..I dunno.

That\'s about all I got, sorry.

-Drakomis
Anyone else? this is really getting frustrating, I wanna build my space station! D:

Anyone else? this is really getting frustrating, I wanna build my space station! D:

Asked the Orbiter forums, once I get a reply I\'ll post here.
